message: Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day!
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more
I'll think you can do better than that. I'll give you a chance to make a better offer.
A bit more realistic, don't you think?
I'll give you 300k, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
Not bad, but I think I can do better than that. You're getting a pretty sweet deal here.
Getting closer to a deal, but I'm not there yet.
I'll give you 200k, but I'm getting desperate
You're really feeling the pinch, aren't you? I'm not going to take advantage of you now.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to compromise.
